name: GameSalad Marketplace Asset File
summary: File used by GameSalad Creator, a multi-platform game development program used for building iOS, Android, and HTML5 games; saves an archive of assets, such as art, music, or game development components, that can be sold and distributed on the GameSalad Marketplace; allows game developers to purchase and download assets for inclusion in their games.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
